Package com.irurueta.ar.slam

Interface BaseSlamEstimator.BaseSlamEstimatorListener<D extends BaseCalibrationData>

Type Parameters:
D - calibrator type associated to implementations of SLAM calibration data.
Enclosing class:
BaseSlamEstimator<D extends BaseCalibrationData>
public static interface BaseSlamEstimator.BaseSlamEstimatorListener<D extends BaseCalibrationData>
Listener for implementations of this class.

    Method
    Description
    void
    onCorrectedWithPositionMeasure(BaseSlamEstimator<D> estimator)
    Called after internal state has been corrected using an external measure.
    void
    onCorrectWithPositionMeasure(BaseSlamEstimator<D> estimator)
    Called when internal state is about to be corrected by using an external measure.
    void
    onFullSampleProcessed(BaseSlamEstimator<D> estimator)
    Called when a full sample (accelerometer + gyroscope, etc.) has been received and has already been processed, and hence internal state has also been updated.
    void
    onFullSampleReceived(BaseSlamEstimator<D> estimator)
    Called when a full sample (accelerometer + gyroscope, etc.) has been received and is about to be processed to update internal state.
